title: Finance Secretary - Foundation Program
status: Full Time,1 FTE (239 day calendar)Minimum Requirements:Associate's Degree or equivalent; or six months to one year related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.Must have the ability to use financial software, spreadsheets, and documents.  Must understand financial procedures, policies, and laws and have the ability to communicate financial data to non-financial personnel.The salary for this position is assigned to Lane 9 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Secretary- Foundation Program.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
